snippet: HBO’s “Behind the Candelabra” and “Boardwalk Empire” took early leads in the annual Emmy race when the Academy of Television Arts and Sciences handed out its Creative Arts awards on Sunday in categories like casting and directing.
abstract: HBO’s “Behind the Candelabra” and “Boardwalk Empire” took early leads in the annual Emmy race when the Academy of Television Arts and Sciences handed out its Creative Arts awards on Sunday in categories like casting and directing.

headline.main: HBO Leads, as Usual, in Emmys Creative Arts Awards
headline.print_headline: HBO Leads, As Usual, In Creative Arts Awards
